Ukran the Great was a wizard who lived in Ravens Bluff in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Ukran lived in a blue two-story house on Magicians Row  It was the second of five houses. Written on the wall above the door were the Thorass letters for "Thay".
Ukran had a crow familiar, smoked Dragonfire tobacco, and was primarily a tea drinker.
Circa 1357 DR, the City Guard serving Regent of the Exchequer Vernon Condor considered Ukran the Great for the theft of two minor magic items of historical importance from the city vaults, after suspicions and divinations tracked the thieves to Magicians Row. However, Ukran was innocent.
